quotes.quote: If you're going to modify me, at least turn me into a grasshopper man! Or a beetle! Or one of those imaginary freaks!
A Coma doesn't exist, it is a preparatory research for the next life.
People tend to show off their act of kindness. It is not an act of good will, it is a demand because they are expecting a word of grace as a reward.
The biggest mistake in my life is that i was born!
A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
Hope is like a treasure, which you cannot carry alone.
C'mon, there is no such thing as gross stuff in this world...  Except for GROSSLY CUTE things.
